segments.text: I'm watching the two children, and they are quite a team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is a little acrobat, climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable, I really hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But his determination to get to those cookies is admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and a plate to catch the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've clearly mastered the art of stealthy cookie procurement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood adventure, full of daring and sugar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the precariousness of that stool makes me hold my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the adult hasn't noticed their little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely elsewhere, which is quite convenient for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a delicate balance of fun and danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are going to be so thrilled with their sugary spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't cause a bigger mess than the sink already is.
segments.speaker: PAR
